name: fetch-dot
description: A pure function that allows you to retrieve a member of an object or an array utilizing dot notation
author: Mike Mclaren <mike@dialexa.com>

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
